subject: ATTN:
body:
ATTN:
you are legally contacted regarding the release of your long awaited
fund of $10million. After a detailed review of your file,i wish to
inform you that your Swift Credit Card payment is being processed and
will be released to you as soon as you respond to this office.Please
re-confirm to us the following,
Your Name,
Your Address,
Phone,
Your Age,Private email address:
mralexogu2014@aol.com
God Blessed

subject: Re:  ATTN:
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for your message. I am interested in the release of my long-awaited fund. Here are the details you requested:

Name: John Doe
Address: 123 Main Street, Anytown, USA
Phone: (123) 456-7890
Email Address: johndoe@email.com

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Karen
